document.full_text: tajik security forces have killed an islamist warlord and 10 of his fighters who had been accused of an attack on a column of government troops, tajik news agencies reported friday.
document.title: asia: tajikistan: islamist fighters killed
lines_and_colors: tajik security forces have killed an islamist warlord and 10 of his fighters who had been accused of an attack on a column of government troops, tajik news agencies reported friday.
